title: Looking to join or make a summoners society open ladder team
body:
Hi, I am a current D5 ADC player looking to start up a team or to join a team to play in the summoners society open ladder. Looking for D5+ TOP/JG/MID/SUP to start a team so add me in game: thereoker . Or add me in game if you are looking for an adc player for a diamond + team :) thanks. Once I have found some players I will start up a team discord and we can get things going. Heres my op.gg in case you're interested.
http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=thereoker
